original_title: New Bomb Turks: Reigning on Edinburgh
overview: Punkers the New Bomb Turks -- whose hard-hitting sound appeals to fans on both sides of the Atlantic -- wowed the faithful in this heady 1994 performance recorded in Edinburgh, Scotland. Once a Columbus, Ohio, garage band, the New Bomb Turks emerged during the 1990s punk revival, and many consider this British tour one of the group's best. The set list includes "Up for a Downslide," "Sucker Punch," "Out of My Mind" and "Long Gone Sister."
title: New Bomb Turks: Reigning on Edinburgh
